titleInfo.title: Coll 30/134 'Persian Gulf. Question of residence of European women in Bahrain and Koweit'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 14; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence concerning the need for oil companies active in Bahrain and Kuwait to provide suitable accommodation for any 'European women' resident there. The correspondence is between officials at the India Office, Petroleum Concessions Limited and the Kuwait Oil Company.The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
